function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of standardization in data collection and annotation for COVID-19 medication","Impact":"Inaccurate or inconsistent data may lead to incorrect modeling and analysis of COVID-19 medication","Mitigation":"Establish standardized protocols for data collection and annotation, and provide training to users","Technologies":"Biomedical knowledge graphs, ontologies, and data integration platforms","People":"Biomedical researchers, data analysts, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Biomedical institutions and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate semantic interoperability of unstructured data in the COVID-19 domain","Impact":"Difficulty in mining and integrating unstructured data, leading to incomplete or biased analysis of COVID-19 information","Mitigation":"Develop a novel ontology for semantic interoperability and integrate with existing biomedical knowledge graph","Technologies":"Ontologies, text mining tools, and semantic interoperability platforms","People":"Data scientists, bioinformaticians, and knowledge engineers","Owner":"Biomedical research institutions and data science teams"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of data from IoT sensors for COVID-19 infection transmission and health symptoms monitoring","Impact":"Incorrect understanding of infection transmission and health trends, leading to improper decision-making in disease control and prevention","Mitigation":"Develop standardized guidelines for IoT data interpretation and validation, and provide training to IoT operators","Technologies":"IoT platforms, data sensing devices, and health analytics applications","People":"IoT operators, health data analysts, and public health authorities","Owner":"Health organizations and IoT technology providers"}]}
